amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow State and local governments to continue to file securities fraud lawsuits under existing securities laws for three years after enactment of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow state and local governments to continue to file securities fraud lawsuits under existing securities laws for three years after enactment of the bill. The purpose of the extension would be to allow state and local governments time to determine whether or not a case of fraud has occurred.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 248, 1 Present (Roll no. 212).
